hero.title: Participate in GYNT 2025
hero.subtitle: Join the Georgian Young Naturalists' Tournament and represent your school in an inspiring scientific challenge.

whoCan.title: Who Can Participate?
rules: Students under 17 years old (as of January 1, 2026)
Must be enrolled in a public or private school in Georgia
Each school may register 1 team of 6 students
Each team must have 1–2 team leaders and a team captain

format.title: Tournament Format
format.prepDesc:
Now – May 9, 2025
Teams prepare solutions to 17 science problems with guidance from mentors.
format.fightDesc:
May 10–12, 2025
Teams compete in Science Fights with roles like Presenter, Opponent, Reviewer.

list.event: Award ceremony and national team selection

register.title: Ready to Register?
register.desc: Submit your school using the official registration form.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Can students from different schools form a team?
faq.a1: No, all team members must be from the same school.
faq.a2: Participants must be younger than 17 on January 1, 2026.
faq.a3: Yes, there is no participation fee.
